title: got a qeue buster for a glitch
body: I chose a character to ban and it would not let me ban them the ban button never came up and made me dodge and now i have a 30 minute qeue buster this is really starting to get me annoyed.

replies.body: It sounds like your network might be unstable and losing sync in champion select, which can leave you behind.  The steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help fix this up, but be sure to test it in a custom game to prevent another [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging).  Let me know if you have any questions!

I have been getting stuck in leaver que for voting /remake. Was wondering why I was getting stuck in leaver buster went back to my history and saw that there have been multiple games where someone goes afk or does not load into game so we vote to remake. Apparently that counts towards your leaves even though its not you afk or leaving. What really pisses me off is I can go back and view my history of the remakes and it shows I was in lane killing minions and playing while the guy who was afk has no items or minions killed...
